original_text: So when they had gone through all the land, they came to Jerusalem at the end of nine months and twenty days.
korean_text: 그들 무리가 국내를 두루 돌아 아홉 달 스무 날 만에 예루살렘에 이르러

sentences.original_text: So when they had gone through all the land
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들이 온 땅을 다 돌았을 때

sentences.original_text: at the end of nine months and twenty days
sentences.korean_translation: 아홉 달 스무 날이 끝났을 때
